name: Pleco Chinese Dictionary Backup File
summary: Learn about .PQB-BACKUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: PQB-BACKUP files are similar to .PQB files, which are used more often.

description: Backup file used by Pleco Chinese Dictionary, a document reader, dictionary, and flashcard program for iOS that helps users learn Chinese; stores a backup of a flashcard database or user dictionary.
